description.en: Allows you to redistribute your skill points once. Does not work for Vagrants.
description.ar: Allows you to redistribute your skill points once. Does not work for Vagrants.
description.br: Permite redistribuir seus pontos de habilidade. Não funciona para Vagrants.
description.cns: 可重置技能点，对初心者无效。
description.de: Erlaubt es dir, deine Skillpunkte neu zu verteilen. Kann nicht von Vagranten eingesetzt werden.
description.fi: Allows you to redistribute your skill points once. Does not work for Vagrants.
description.fil: Allows you to redistribute your skill points once. Does not work for Vagrants.
description.fr: Parchemin permettant de redistribuer une fois tous les points de compétences (Inutilisable par le Vagabond).
description.id: Memungkinkan kamu untuk mendistribusikan kembali poin keterampilanmu sekali. Tidak bekerja untuk Vagrant.
description.it: Allows you to redistribute your skill points once. Does not work for Vagrants.
description.jp: スキルを初期化して再分配することのできる秘術が書かれた巻物
description.nl: Allows you to redistribute your skill points once. Does not work for Vagrants.
description.pl: Allows you to redistribute your skill points once. Does not work for Vagrants.
description.ru: Позволяет перераспределить очки умений. Не подходит для Бродяг.
description.sp: Permite la redistribución de los puntos de habilidad. No sirve para los Vagrants.
description.sw: Allows you to redistribute your skill points once. Does not work for Vagrants.
description.th: ช่วยให้คุณสามารถแจกจ่ายskill pointsของคุณได้หนึ่งครั้ง ใช้งานไม่ได้กับVagrants
description.tw: 允許將技能重置。但見習生無法使用。
description.vi: Cho phép bạn phân phối lại điểm kỹ năng của mình một lần. Không hoạt động đối với Vagrant.
